excuses.name: #proteins-tho
excuses.description: We need to eat meat to get proteins
excuses.response: You can get your proteins from plants

excuses.name: #lions-tho
excuses.response: Lions eat other animals for survival. We don't do it for survival

excuses.name: #taste-tho
excuses.description: I like the taste of meat too much
excuses.response: Taste is not worth the suffering of animals

excuses.name: #nature-tho
excuses.response: Just because something is natural does not mean it's moral

excuses.name: #culture-tho
excuses.response: Just because something is part of your culture does not mean it's moral

excuses.name: #health-tho
excuses.description: I need meat to be healthy
excuses.response: You can get all the nutrients you need from plants. A study done by the Harvard School of Public Health found that a vegan diet is associated with a 34% lower risk of death from heart disease, a 50% lower risk of death from cancer, and a 76% lower risk of death from diabetes
